meanings.definition: Otologists: specialists in the study and treatment of ear disorders.
meanings.sent1: The otologists at the hospital helped many patients with ear problems.
meanings.sent2: The otologists conducted research to understand and treat ear conditions.
meanings.sent3: The otologists joked that they could hear a pin drop from a mile away.
meanings.sent4: The otologists' knowledge of ears was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The otologists' dedication to ear health was unwavering.

meanings.definition: Otologists: those who focus on the medical and surgical treatment of ear diseases.
meanings.sent1: My friend wants to become one of the otologists who perform ear surgeries.
meanings.sent2: The otologists in the clinic provided expert care for all ear-related issues.
meanings.sent3: The otologists playfully referred to themselves as the 'ear wizards'.
meanings.sent4: The otologists' precision in surgery was like that of skilled craftsmen.
meanings.sent5: The otologists' clinic was a sanctuary for those with ear ailments.
